duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure successful and consistent implementation of client retention program.
Provide recommendations for improving client retention program and develop execution plan.
Manage metrics to ensure client retention rates, satisfaction rates, and product problem resolution times.
Act as liaison between clients and internal technology group for product improvements.
Meet deadlines and ensure high-quality deliverables.
Contribute innovative ideas for technologies and new revenue streams.
Participate in product development and technology innovation meetings.
Participate in weekly project and production meetings.
Perform ad hoc tasks as necessary.
Plan and oversee product launches, both online and in-person.
Lead product retention program planning and implementation.
Participate in national and international travel, if required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from a U.S. accredited four-year college or university.
Minimum 1 year related experience and/or training in client services and project management, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
